item.title: Recursive Methods in Probability
item.description: Problems can of course be solved in mutliple ways. Sometimes the natural, methodical solution to a problem is very lengthy, so knowing some tricks is useful. One such trick is recursive reasoning, which can prove useful in certain types of probability problems and puzzles. I like these methods since the...
